T02TD1884E:162a-5: 'di ni dam tshig gis gso ba'o //
T02TD1884E:162a-6: phyi'i khrus byed par 'dod na rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas zla ba la gnas te /
T02TD1884E:162a-7: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nyid kyis khrus bya'o //
T02TD1884E:162a-8: thun mtshams gzhan la yang snga ma bzhin du mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD1884E:162a-9: thig le dang phra mo bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas sngags kyi bzlas pa byas la //
T02TD1884E:162a-10: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nang du chung par byas la /
T02TD1884E:162a-11: snying rje dang shes rab tu ldan pas nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD1884E:162a-12: langs ba'i dus su spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi glus bskul nas nang par langs te /
T02TD1884E:162a-13: las dang po bas snga ma bzhin du legs par bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD1884E:162a-14: de ltar nyin re bzhin thun bzhi'i rim gyis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor bas mtshan ma gnyis thob pa'i bar ni las dang po pa'o //
T02TD1884E:162a-15: de nas sngags kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dag par ldan zhing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs ba dang bral bas nye bar sgrub pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD1884E:162a-16: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pa la mtshan ma gsum po thob pa'i bar ni ye shes cung zad tsam la dbang thob pa'o //
T02TD1884E:162a-17: de rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs shing spro ba dang bsdu ba byed pa mtshan ma bzhi thob pa ni ye shes la dbang thob pa ste /
T02TD1884E:162a-18: nyin mtshan du mngon par sbyor ba tsam bsten bar bya'o //
T02TD1884E:162b-0: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab re re'i nang du chud ba'i 'khor lo gsum gyi gzugs @162b brnyan gyi bdag nyid can gyi gzugs su bsgom pas rtag tu snang ba'i mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes la dbang thob pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1884E:162b-1: de nas sngags grub cing mtshan ma mang po thob nas /
T02TD1884E:162b-2: de kho na nyid gsum la mchod pa byas la /
T02TD1884E:162b-3: rang gi sngags mar me mdzad bzang pos bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i chogs rgyud las bshad pa'i mngon par 'dod ba'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1884E:162b-4: bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i don du ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can gyi 'khor lor gnas shing 'od zer spro ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1884E:162b-5: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar lhag par mos la /
T02TD1884E:162b-6: ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba lang bar bya ste /
T02TD1884E:162b-7: gdug pa'i dgra ni rjes dran bya //
T02TD1884E:162b-9: gang zhig dbus na gnas gyur pa //
T02TD1884E:162b-11: de bzhin gshegs par bdag gyur na //
T02TD1884E:162b-12: de yi gnas su mi bskyod bzhugs //
T02TD1884E:162b-13: gzhan bdag rang bdag gnas su ste //
T02TD1884E:162b-14: rang nyid la ni rang bdag po //
T02TD1884E:162b-16: blo dang ldan pas gzhug par bya //
T02TD1884E:162b-17: rnam pa kun du sngon po ni //
T02TD1884E:162b-18: g-yon min zhal mar g-yas min par //
T02TD1884E:162b-19: ye shes zhal snga'i rjes 'brang nas ;
T02TD1884E:162b-20: / gsang 'dus las ni shes par bya //
T02TD1884E:162b-21: de ltar byang phyogs lam pa'i mkhas pa'i zhabs bsten nas //
T02TD1884E:162b-22: yang dag thob pa de nyid brjed pas 'dir 'jigs te /
T02TD1884E:162b-23: do tsha spangs nas gsal byas nga rgyal gyis ma yin //
T02TD1884E:162b-24: des 'dir blo bzangs rigs tshul can gyis bzod bar mdzod //
T02TD1884E:162b-25: ye shes dam pa'i gzhung lugs rang gi shes rab kyis //
T02TD1884E:162b-26: cung zad gsal bshad dge ba mchog gyur gang bsags pa //
T02TD1884E:162b-27: des ni 'gro kun gnyis med zla ba las byung ba'i //
T02TD1884E:162b-28: 'od zer bzang pos mun gsal thugs kyi mgo ni thob shog //
T02TD1884E:162b-29: dpal ldan mi bskyod rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs ;
T02TD1884E:162b-30: slob dpon dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1884E:162b-32: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po padma ka ra warma dang /
T02TD1884E:162b-33: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang po bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
